ovdesc.p: This table is used to map inbound codewords to outbound codewords of an outgoing redirect payment. This process can be termed as Inbound to Outbound Codeword Mapping.

desc.p: Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies the codeword which is received in the payment message.

Specifies the order (sequence) of the record in the application. Based on the value, a record is prioritised in such a way that, it is given higher preference for selection under peeling logic applied in the payments hub.
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
Additional codes / texts associated with the incoming code word.
Mandatory field. 35 alphanumeric characters which includes wildcard character '*'.
Specifies the information code of the incoming message.
The SWIFT tags containing the codeword.
Specifies the type of the incoming message payment.
Value links to field, 'MessagePaymentType' in PPT.MSGPAYMENTTYPE
Specifies the source of the payment.
Value links to field 'Source' in PPT.SOURCE.
Specifies the BIC of the receiver bank.
Field is a free text field, but it is checked against field 'BICCode' in PPT.BICTABLE. Wildcard character "*" is also allowed.
Indicates the type of the outbound payment message.
Value links to field, 'MessagePaymentType' in PPT.MSGPAYMENTTYPE
Specifies the currency of the transaction.
Value links to field, 'CurrencyCode' in PPT.CURRENCY.
Specifies the priority of the message.
Value ranges from 1 to 9. Default value will be set to 1.
Specifies the information code of the outbound message.
It is mandatory when processing sequence number is null.
Specifies the codeword which is to be sent in the outgoing payment message.
It is mandatory when processing sequence number is null.
Additional codes / texts associated with the outbound code word.
35 alphanumeric characters which includes wildcard character '*'.
Specifies the number corresponding to the processing sequence that needs to be executed.
7 alphanumeric characters. Value links to field, 'ProcessingSequenceNumber' in PPT.PROCESSINGSEQUENCE.
Priority of outbound codewords for SWIFT OUT processing.
Mandatory field. 3 characters. Value ranges from 1 to 999. Default value is set as 1.
Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the user that created or modified the entry.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the system date and time when the entry was created or modified.
It need to be displayed as DD MMM YYYY HH:MM:SS.sss.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the name of the user who approved the entry.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the system date and time when the entry was approved.
It need to be displayed as DD MMM YYYY HH:MM:SS.sss.
The value is not editable by the user.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
